sn55.27:3.1: 27. Dutiyaanāthapiṇḍikasutta
sn55.27:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn55.27:4.3: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
sn55.27:4.4: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkama;
sn55.27:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vanda:
sn55.27:4.7: So āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
sn55.27:4.9: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn55.27:5.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so puriso anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa paṭissutvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.27:5.2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn55.27:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.27:5.5: So āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandati.
sn55.27:5.7: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn55.27:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.27:6.3: Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn55.27:6.5: Kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
sn55.27:6.8: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
sn55.27:7.1: “Catūhi kho, gahapati, dhammehi samannāgatassa assutavato puthujjanassa hoti uttāso, hoti chambhitattaṃ, hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:7.3: Idha, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano buddhe appasādena samannāgato hoti.
sn55.27:7.4: Tañca panassa buddhe appasādaṃ attani samanupassato hoti uttāso, hoti chambhitattaṃ, hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano dhamme appasādena samannāgato hoti.
sn55.27:8.2: Tañca panassa dhamme appasādaṃ attani samanupassato hoti uttāso, hoti chambhitattaṃ, hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano saṅghe appasādena samannāgato hoti.
sn55.27:9.2: Tañca panassa saṅghe appasādaṃ attani samanupassato hoti uttāso, hoti chambhitattaṃ, hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano dussīlyena samannāgato hoti.
sn55.27:10.2: Tañca panassa dussīlyaṃ attani samanupassato hoti uttāso, hoti chambhitattaṃ, hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:10.3: Imehi kho, gahapati, catūhi dhammehi samannāgatassa assutavato puthujjanassa hoti uttāso, hoti chambhitattaṃ, hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:11.1: Catūhi kho, gahapati, dhammehi samannāgatassa sutavato ariyasāvakassa na hoti uttāso, na hoti chambhitattaṃ, na hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:11.3: Idha, gahapati, sutavā ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.27:11.6: Tañca panassa buddhe aveccappasādaṃ attani samanupassato na hoti uttāso, na hoti chambhitattaṃ, na hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, gahapati, sutavā ariyasāvako dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.27:12.4: Tañca panassa dhamme aveccappasādaṃ attani samanupassato na hoti uttāso, na hoti chambhitattaṃ, na hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, gahapati, sutavā ariyasāvako saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.27:13.4: Tañca panassa saṅghe aveccappasādaṃ attani samanupassato na hoti uttāso, na hoti chambhitattaṃ, na hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:14.1: Puna caparaṃ, gahapati, sutavā ariyasāvako ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.27:14.3: Tāni ca panassa ariyakantāni sīlāni attani samanupassato na hoti uttāso, na hoti chambhitattaṃ, na hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ.
sn55.27:14.4: Imehi kho, gahapati, catūhi dhammehi samannāgatassa sutavato ariyasāvakassa na hoti uttāso, na hoti chambhitattaṃ, na hoti samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayan”ti.
sn55.27:15.3: Ahañhi, bhante, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato homi—
sn55.27:15.10: Yāni cimāni, bhante, bhagavatā gihisāmīcikāni sikkhāpadāni desitāni, nāhaṃ tesaṃ kiñci attani khaṇḍaṃ samanupassāmī”ti.
